thread.title: Business Travel Awards: Entries now open
thread.title_full: Business Travel Awards: Entries now open

author: Buying Business Travel
title: Business Travel Awards: Entries now open
text:
Business Travel Awards: Entries now open 0 comments Follow @BBT_online 
BBT is pleased to announce that entries to the annual Business Travel Awards are now open. 
The event will be held on Monday January 18, 2016 at the Grosvenor House hotel and will feature the new award – Rising Star of the Year. 
In addition to this new category, our Specialist Business Travel Product/Provider award has been split into two separate categories – Best Specialist Business Travel Service and Best Travel Technology Product . 
There is no entry fee, and you can enter as many of the 22 categories as you feel appropriate. Entry deadline is September 7. 
To enter the awards and for more information head to businesstravelawards.com 
Click here to view a list of the winners from this year’s event. 
Watch highlights of this year's event on our video montage below
